mapper.select: SELECT paper_id,assign_time,submit_number FROM class_paper WHERE paper_id=#{paperId} AND class_id=#{class_id} LEFT JOIN (SELECT paper_name FROM paper WHERE paper_id=#{paperId}) ON class_paper.paper_id=(SELECT paper_name FROM paper WHERE paper_id=#{paperId}).paper_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT student_number FROM class WHERE class.class_id=#{class_id}) ON class_paper.class_id=class.class_id
